name: Dead Frontier 2
detailed_description:
Online survival horror at its darkest. As one of the few survivors of the outbreak, you must scratch a living out of the decaying ruins of society. Scavenge for supplies, trade with other players, and grow your sphere of influence. All the while, keeping your eyes peeled for the infected lurking around every corner.

KEY FEATURES

  • True Survival Horror:
    This is not a PvP shooter with the odd zombie thrown in for good measure. Surviving the infected in this chilling world will be your #1 challenge.

  • Never the Same:
    The procedural game world and missions regenerate daily so you'll constantly be on your toes.

  • Hunt for Rare Loot:
    Equipment can be found with any number of random properties. Your next find could be the one that makes you rich.

  • Unique Characters:
    Choose from a huge variety of skills and rare equipment to create your own unique character build. Customise your avatar further with a wide range of clothing and accessories.

  • Player-driven Economy:
    Realistic trading mechanics such as multiple currencies, taxes & supply/demand.

  • Ethical Free-To-Play:
    Spending real money will never give you a gameplay advantage. Only cosmetics and utility upgrades are sold for real money.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 8550 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD A10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 or equivalent 1 GB VRAM card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
